>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<

For OSCOLA punctuation rules.

>>===== RESULT =====>>
..[0] Court of Appeals 10 (Civil Division) 15
>>[1] Court of Error 20, 25
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-1", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1",
                    "locator": "15"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 1
            }
        }, 
        [], 
        []
    ],
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-2", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-2",
                    "locator": "25"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 2
            }
        }, 
        [["CITATION-1", 1]], 
        []
    ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=", ">
        <group delimiter=" ">
          <names variable="authority">
            <name/>
            <institution use-last="1" form="short"/>
          </names>
          <number variable="page"/>
          <names variable="authority" prefix="(" suffix=")"> 
            <name/>
            <institution use-first="1" institution-parts="short"/>
          </names>
          <choose>
            <if authority-residue="true">
              <number variable="locator"/>
            </if>
          </choose>
        </group>
        <number variable="locator"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "authority": [
            {
                "family": "Court of Appeals|Civil Division", 
                "given": "",
                "isInstitution": 1
            }
        ],
        "page": 10,
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "type": "legal_case"
    },
    {
        "authority": [
            {
                "family": "Court of Error", 
                "given": "",
                "isInstitution": 1
            }
        ],
        "page": 20,
        "id": "ITEM-2", 
        "type": "legal_case"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
